title: 820-3435  no lcd
message:
customer was told buy another store the bios is not working, after opening the macbook I found the board was never removed
green light fan spins
backlight on no lcd
bkl 21.91v
u5670 rabbit hole (why apple)
Im not 100% sure how the dp circuit works on these

title: 820-3435  no lcd
message: If backlight is on then the LCD is working. Removed SSD? Can you do a PRAM reset?

title: 820-3435  no lcd
message: no folder icon, ssd removed, pram reset done, the fan did an extra spin, no chime

title: 820-3435  no lcd
message: Did it do a PRAM, LCD goes off and comes back on? It does sound like a corrupt BIOS.

title: 820-3435  no lcd
message: it does a normal pram reset, but without a chime or anything on the screen

title: 820-3435  no lcd
message: Disconnect IO board flat cable to be sure that is not messing with anything. Actually disconnect everything besides the LCD. After that is does seem to be a ROM issue.
